Verses: 1 karththarudaiya Aalayaththukkaaga Saalomon Seydha Velaiyellaam Mudindhapodhu, Saalomon Than Thagappanaagiya Dhaaveedhu Parisuththampannumpadi Nerndhavaigalaik Konduvandhu, Velliyaiyum, Ponnaiyum, Sagala Panimuttugalaiyum, Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththin Pokkishangalil Vaiththaan.

2 pinbu Karththarudaiya Udanpadikkaippettiyai Seeyon Ennum Dhaaveedhin Nagaraththilirundhu Konduvarumpadi Saalomon Isravelin Moopparaiyum, Koththirap Prabukkalaagiya Isravel Puththirarin Vamsath Thalaivarellaaraiyum Erusalemile Koodivarachcheydhaan.
3 appadiye Isravelar Ellaarum Ezhaam Maadhaththin Pandigaiyile Raajaavinidaththil Koodivandhaargal.
4 isravelin Mooppar Ellaarum Vandhapinbu Leviyar Pettiyai Eduththu,
5 pettiyaiyum, Aasarippuk Koodaaraththaiyum, Koodaaraththilirukkira Parisuththa Panimuttugalaiyum Konduvandhaargal; Avaigalaik Konduvandhavargal Leviyaraana Aasaariyare.
6 raajaavaagiya Saalomonum, Avanode Koodina Isravel Sabaiyaaranaivarum, Pettikku Munbaaga Ennikkaikkum Thogaikkum Adangaadha Eraalamaana Aadumaadugalaip Paliyittaargal.
7 appadiye Aasaariyar Karththarudaiya Udanpadikkaip Pettiyai, Aalayaththin Sannidhiyaagiya Magaa Parisuththamaana Sthalaththile, Kerubeengaludaiya Settaigalukkuk Keezhaagak Konduvandhu Vaiththaargal.
8 kerubeengal, Pettiyirukkum Sthaanaththinmel, Thangal Irandirandu Settaigalai Viriththu Uyara Irundhu Pettiyaiyum Adhin Thandugalaiyum Moodikkondirundhana.

9 pettiyilirukkira Thandugalinmunaigal Sannidhi Sthalaththirku Munne Kaanappadaththakkadhaai Andhath Thandugalai Izhuththaargal; Purambe Avaigal Kaanappadavillai; Adhu Innaalvaraikkum Ange Irukkiradhu.

10 isravel Puththirar Egipthilirundhu Purappattapin, Karththar Orepile Avargalodu Udanpadikkai Panninapodhu, Mose Andhap Pettiyile Vaiththa Irandu Karpalagaigale Allaamal Adhile Verondrum Irundhadhillai.
11 vaguppugalin Muraigalaip Paaraamal, Aasaariyar Ellorum Thangalaip Parisuththampannikkondaargal.

12 aasaab, Emaan, Edhuththoonudaiya Koottaththaarum, Avargaludaiya Kumaarar Sagodhararudaiya Koottaththaarumaagiya Paadagaraana Leviyaranaivarum Melliyapudavaigalaith Thariththu, Kaiththaalangalaiyum Thamburugalaiyum Suramandalangalaiyum Pidiththup Palipeedaththirkuk Kizhakke Nindraargal; Avargalodumkoodap Poorigaigalai Oodhugira Aasaariyargal Nootrirubadhuper Nindraargal.

13 avargal Orumikkap Poorigaigalai Oodhi, Egasaththamaaik Karththaraith Thudhiththu Sthoththiriththup Paadinaargal; Aasaariyar Parisuththa Sthalaththilirundhu Purappadugaiyilum, Paadagar Poorigaigal Thaalangal Keedhavaaththiyangaludaiya Saththaththaith Thonikkappanni Karththar Nallavar Avar Kirubai Endrumulladhendru Avarai Sthoththirikkaiyilum, Karththarudaiya Veedaagiya Dhevaalayam Megaththinaal Niraiyappattadhu.
14 andha Megaththinimiththam Aasaariyargal Oozhiyancheydhu Nirkak Koodaamarpoyitru; Karththarudaiya Magimai Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththai Nirappitru.
